original_title: 濃蜜舌技 めくりあげる
overview: A woman wants to throw herself off a bridge after her boyfriend of two years breaks things off with her. The guy who stops her from doing so is looking for his ex-girlfriend, who he is planning to kill. The woman makes off with his gun and from then on plans to kill her ex as well.
title: Intense Tongue Technique: Turn Over
